Package de.uni_hannover.hci.cardgame.gameLogic.Player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_hannover.hci.cardgame.gameLogic.Player.Player
  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This represents one of the 8 possible players.
    Author:
    Yann Bernhard <yann.bernhard@stud.uni-hannover.de>, Sebastian Kiel <sebastian.kiel@stud.uni-hannover.de>, Patrick Schewe <p.schewe@stud.uni-hannover.de>, Robert Witteck <robert.witteck@stud.uni-hannover.de>
